data.title: Don't waste your money or time
data.text:
Ordered a pan pizza, had it delivered.  When opened, pizza was swimming in liquid. So much liquid that we had to pour it off into a cup. Pizza was wet and soggy, a complete mess.  
 To make it worse, I contacted Pizza Hut to let them know, they told me to go to a website and file a complaint which I did. Got a response that it would take a few days and they will get back to me. Never heard from anyone… Radio Silence.  #pizzahutfail

data.title: I hate the new system
data.text: I was with a babysitter I'm 11 and my parents where out of town we didn't have a car and we where trying to order a pizza it said my address was out of range when I live like 2 miles away from the place so we were left hungry

data.title: I always order pizza online.
data.text:
I have found this pizza hut to be ok... I would suggest you call after you order online to see if they are on time.... that seems to be only one of two issues I have.... it is sometimes ready on time.  Once it was so late they just gave it to me free.  The pizza is pretty good. 
2nd issue- When you arrive to pick up your pizza the service is not so great....they don't seem too happy....however I continue to order and look forward to a better experience.

data.title: Ordering pizza via website or phone app.
data.text: You will receive your pizza faster and correctly made if you use the website or phone app. Online you can receive free extras, (example, free bread sticks, 2ltr soda, bogo pizzas, & free pizza using your VISA card."

data.title: Extra care for those with food allergies!
data.text: Have had Take Home twice, both times really good pizza. They took extra care to make sure pizzas were not contaminated by stray mushrooms (deadly to my mate).  Very happy to have found them, and their prices are very good. Go online to find specials
